elements.title: CoreCard Proprietary Software and Processing Services Overview

data.value: CoreENGINE™ – a core financial transaction processing platform supporting credit, loan, prepaid, and debit card operations.

Offers feature-rich applications with web interfaces, APIs, multi-lingual and multi-currency support, real-time processing, complex rules-based authorizations, account hierarchies, and robust fee libraries.
Provides two options: a software license (though being de-emphasized) for in-house processing and Processing Services for outsourced card processing.
Designed to run on scalable, lower cost PC-based servers, reducing overall processing costs as volumes grow.

elements.title: Revenue Recognition Policy

data.value: Product revenue from software licenses; Service revenue from processing services, professional services (customization, consulting, training), reimbursable expenses, and software maintenance and customer support.

Arrangements typically include: an initial contract for licensing certain modules along with implementation services and post contract support (PCS); purchases of additional licenses for new modules or tier upgrades; optional standalone contracts for additional services such as custom features or extra training; and contracts with an initial fee plus recurring monthly fees.

At contract inception, performance obligations are identified for each distinct product or service promised. Revenue is recognized either at a point in time (for distinct software licenses) or over time as the services are rendered (e.g., PCS, implementation services, recurring fees).

Software licenses are recognized at delivery. Implementation fees are recognized over the customer life after completion. PCS and recurring service fees are recognized ratably on a straight-line basis over the contract term, while standalone service contracts are recognized upon completion or as services are provided.

Costs expensed in period incurred; contract specific development costs are capitalized and recognized alongside revenue.

data.value: В письме отмечается, что изменилось 'boiler plate' компании, что отражает эволюцию сообщений и ясность позиции компании.
Corecard теперь позиционируется как 'The GOLD standard of Modern Issuer Processing' — это символизирует модернизацию, доказанную прибыльность и ориентированность на рост.

Подчеркивается необходимость коллективного усилия и 'грубой' дисциплины для достижения высоких стандартов, а также уверенность в стабильном росте и способности добавлять 'кирпичики' к прочному фундаменту.
Выражена благодарность акционерам, клиентам и сотрудникам за вклад в успех и дальнейшее развитие компании.
